description: A dashboard for visualizing results from the k6.io load testing tool by groups, using the InfluxDB exporter.Based on https://grafana.com/dashboards/10660

targets.query: SELECT count("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND "error_code" = '' AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "http_req_failed" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND value=1 AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "checks" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND value=1 AND $timeFilter
SELECT count("value") FROM "checks" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND value!=1 AND $timeFilter

SELECT count("value"), mean("value") as avg, min("value"), median("value"), max("value"), percentile("value", 90) as "p(90)", percentile("value", 95) as "p(95)" FROM "http_req_duration" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "perfTag"
SELECT count("value") as failed_req FROM "http_req_failed" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND "error_code" != '' AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "perfTag", status
SELECT count(*) FROM "checks" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND "value" = 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "check"
SELECT sum("value") FROM "vus" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT count("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT count("value") FROM "http_req_failed" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND value = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT count("value") FROM "http_reqs" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND value = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "perfTag" fill(none)
SELECT count("value") FROM "http_req_failed" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND value = 1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "perfTag" fill(none)
SELECT count("value") FROM "checks" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND value=1 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "perfTag" fill(none)
SELECT count("value") FROM "checks" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND value = 0 AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "perfTag" fill(null)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "data_sent" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
SELECT sum("value") FROM "data_received" WHERE ("pipeline_id" =~ /^$Build$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "pipeline_id" WHERE $timeFilter
list.label: Build
list.name: Build
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES WITH KEY = "pipeline_id" WHERE $timeFilter

title: k6 Load Testing Results By Tags - new
